basics.name: Viresh Duvvuri
basics.label: Agentic AI Engineer
basics.summary: Agentic AI Engineer specializing in multi-agent systems, RAG architectures, and production AI deployment. Expert in LangChain/LangGraph with proven track record building agentic workflows that reduce analysis time by 60% while maintaining 85%+ accuracy through hallucination prevention and human-in-the-loop validation. Experienced in AWS, Docker, vector databases, and full-stack development for AI-driven applications.

highlights: Built production RAG system for drone crash diagnostics using LangChain, improving troubleshooting accuracy from 40% to 85% through semantic search and vector database retrieval
Implemented source citation and confidence scoring to prevent hallucinations in mission-critical diagnostics
Deployed FastAPI backend with Docker containerization for scalable AI inference
Integrated OpenAI API with custom prompt engineering for technical log analysis
Architected 3-agent orchestration system using LangGraph, reducing grid analysis time by 60% through parallel multi-agent workflows
Implemented human-in-the-loop approval workflows and reflection mechanisms for high-stakes energy decisions
Built state graph memory system for agentic context persistence across multi-step analyses
Developed full-stack proof of concept with React frontend and FastAPI backend, demonstrating end-to-end agentic AI capabilities
Developed real-time flight control algorithms for autonomous drone systems, demonstrating strong problem-solving in complex, safety-critical environments
Integrated sensor fusion and data extraction pipelines for converting unstructured flight data to structured formats
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver production systems under tight deadlines
Conducted AI research on autonomous navigation and decision-making systems
Published research on multi-agent coordination and real-time optimization
Designed and executed experiments with rigorous analytical methodology

projects.name: GridCOP - Grid CoOperator
projects.description: Multi-agent AI system for smart grid analytics and decision-making
highlights: 3-agent system with state graph memory: Researcher (RAG + semantic search), Analyzer (data processing), Advisor (human-in-the-loop validation)
Reduced grid analysis workflow time by 60% through parallel multi-agent coordination
Implemented reflection mechanisms and confidence scoring for high-stakes energy decisions
Built full-stack proof of concept with React frontend and FastAPI backend for stakeholder demos

projects.name: Drone Log Analysis Tool
projects.description: RAG-based diagnostic system for analyzing drone crash logs
highlights: Improved diagnostic accuracy from 40% to 85% using semantic search over 10,000+ technical logs
Implemented source citation and confidence scoring to prevent hallucinations in mission-critical diagnostics
Deployed production system with Docker containerization for scalable AI inference
Converted unstructured flight logs to structured diagnostic insights using custom data extraction pipelines

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Full-stack portfolio with Docker deployment and CI/CD
highlights: Designed and deployed production-ready web application demonstrating full-stack capabilities
Containerized with Docker and deployed with automated CI/CD pipeline
Responsive frontend showcasing technical projects and AI research

awards.summary: Published research on autonomous systems, multi-agent coordination, and real-time decision-making in robotics conferences
